id_table_1.caption: Ablation studies of Doc2Graph model. EP Inner dim and IP FC dim show edge predictor layer input dimension and the input projector fully connected layers output dimension, respectively. AUC-PR refers to the key-value edge class. The # Params refers to Doc2Graph trainable parameters solely.

id_table_2.caption: Entity detection results. YOLOv5 [16]-small performances on the entity detection task.

id_table_3.caption: Results on FUNSD. The results have been shown for both semantic entity labeling and entity linking tasks with their corresponding metrics.

id_table_4.caption: Layout analysis results on RVL-CDIP Invoices. Layout analysis accuracy scores depicted in terms of node classification task.

id_table_5.caption: Table Detection in terms of F1 score. A table is considered correctly detected if its IoU is greater than 0.50. Threshold values refers to the scores an edges has to have in order to do not be cut: in our case is set to 0.50 by the softmax in use.
